channel.title: Quick question... please help though
channel.description:
Hi, im coding my server now, im about 85% done. There is one problem, I cant get attack to work. I have made a new training area, and I want the Zamorak statue to train attack, but for some reason it wont give the EXP. This shouldn't be happening because I made the Guthix statue train strength and it works perfectly! Can someone explain why it wont train attack?
BTW if you help me it will make my server 95% percent done, because iv'e been trying to figure out for a week already what to do, iv'e messed me server up 4 times but lukally I had a backup copy :P. So if anyone could help this would be greatly appritiated!

item.title: Quick question... please help though
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

case 2873: if(actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 53; setAnimation(2068); addSkillXP((99999999*playerLevel[0]), 0); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
Change the EXP given.

Read full topic
